description.en: The male Yukata Set has a Bushido theme and is designed to reflect the way of the warrior!
description.ar: The male Yukata Set has a Bushido theme and is designed to reflect the way of the warrior!
description.br: O conjunto masculino Yukata tem o tema Bushido e foi projetado para refletir o caminho do guerreiro!
description.cns: 以武士道为主题的男性和服是为了体现战士之道而设计的！
description.de: Das männliche Yukata-Set hat ein Bushido-Thema und soll den Weg des Kriegers widerspiegeln!
description.fi: The male Yukata Set has a Bushido theme and is designed to reflect the way of the warrior!
description.fil: The male Yukata Set has a Bushido theme and is designed to reflect the way of the warrior!
description.fr: L'ensemble traditionnel japonais pour garçon reflète la voie du guerrier.
description.id: Set Yukata pria memiliki tema Bushido dan dirancang untuk mencerminkan cara seorang pejuang!
description.it: The male Yukata Set has a Bushido theme and is designed to reflect the way of the warrior!
description.jp: 男性用浴衣セットは「武士道」をテーマにデザインされています。
description.kr: The male Yukata Set has a Bushido theme and is designed to reflect the way of the warrior!
description.nl: The male Yukata Set has a Bushido theme and is designed to reflect the way of the warrior!
description.pl: The male Yukata Set has a Bushido theme and is designed to reflect the way of the warrior!
description.ru: The male Yukata Set has a Bushido theme and is designed to reflect the way of the warrior!
description.sp: ¡El Conjunto Yukata masculino para 2010 tiene el tema de Bushido y está diseñado para reflejar el camino del guerrero!
description.sw: The male Yukata Set has a Bushido theme and is designed to reflect the way of the warrior!
description.th: ชุดยูกาตะชายมีธีมบูชิโดและออกแบบมาเพื่อสะท้อนวิถีของนักรบ!
description.tw: 2010年以武士道為主題的男性日本浴衣套裝，主要是體現武士的方式！
description.vi: Bộ Yukata nam có chủ đề Bushido và được thiết kế để phản ánh cốt cách của chiến binh!
